screenshot.caption: PS1 file open in Windows PowerShell

description: Cmdlets can be used to automate Windows tasks. For example, a cmdlet may rename a group of files to use a new file extension. Another cmdlet may examine the Windows registry and output results to a file. Cmdlets also support aliases, pipelines , and named and positional parameters for commands.
